documentation.text:
Advertisement cannot be deleted until either:
     (1) Token has been retrieved
     (2) Token has expired
     (3) Advertisement has closed with no bids
 Advertisement can only be deleted by admin or by the advertisement PU

deleteAdvertisement(address).notice: Advertisement cannot be deleted until either:     (1) Token has been retrieved     (2) Token has expired     (3) Advertisement has closed with no bids Advertisement can only be deleted by admin or by the advertisement PU
